discounting: Discounting of Affect

Source: R/discounting-package.R
discounting-package.Rd

Functions created to aid with a large-scale evaluation of discounting models for capturing affect in experimental and daily-life datasets. Introduces a class for each separate model as well as a class for datasets, making every function internal to the package run within a standardized framework

See also

Useful links:

  • https://github.com/ndpvh/discounting-affect

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/ndpvh/discounting-affect/issues

Developed by Niels Vanhasbroeck.
